content: संन्यासिन् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} One who lays down or deposits. {@--2@} One who completely renounces the world and its attachments, an ascetic, a Brāhmaṇa in the fourth order of his religious life; ज्ञेयः स नित्यसंन्यासी यो न द्वेष्टि न कांक्षति <ls>Bg. 5. 3.</ls> {@--3@} One who abstains from food (त्यक्ताहार); <ls>Bk. 7. 76.</ls>
